name: linux-infra-textbook
description: Linuxインフラ教本 - サーバー構築・運用の基礎
author: ITDO Inc.（株式会社アイティードゥ）

scripts.start: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.build: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:gh-pages: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.preview: npm run build && cd docs && npx http-server _site -p 8080 --silent
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check-links
scripts.help:
echo 'Available commands:
  npm start - Start development server
  npm run build - Build the book
  npm run preview - Local preview
  npm run deploy - Deploy to GitHub Pages'
